column4: hmm did anybody in here have success on using skype on ubuntu?
mostly... my webcam turns out not to work, but otherwise, yes
possibly a sound driver bug. can you use the mic otherwise?
i didnt actually ever use the mic since i installed ubuntu
try gnome-sound-recorder in the audio/video part of the menu
that gives error: find: paths must precede expression: Analysis.m
id try that sftp in terminal too for a better comparison. id guess nautilus has some overhead
lol it has 10xoverhead in transfer speed just to show some gui crap?
when you create a remote filesystem through nautilus....its actually mounting a remote filesystem, not just adding "some gui crap"
there's an extra layer of indirection in your ~/.gnomevfs
so yeah, i wouldnt be surprised if it created a LOT of overhead.  copying files locally is slower through nautilus or dolphin than through the command line, IME
hmmm okay that really is is quite bad for linux i guess if it has to compete with windows gui copy which does not have such overhead
does windows have a non-gui copy?
